GLOBAL.title: General Filling Instructions
GLOBAL.instruction: The form must be filled in BLACK ink and in CAPITAL LETTERS. All fields marked with an asterisk (*) are mandatory.
rejections: Form not filled in capital letters
Form not filled using black ink

DISPUTE_DATE.title: Date of Application
DISPUTE_DATE.instruction: Enter today's date in DD-MM-YYYY format.

CARDHOLDER_NAME.title: Cardholder Name
CARDHOLDER_NAME.instruction: Write your full name exactly as it appears on your credit or debit card.
rejections: Name does not match bank records

MOBILE_NUMBER.title: Registered Mobile Number
MOBILE_NUMBER.instruction: Enter the 10-digit mobile number that is linked to your bank account.
rejections: Mobile number is not registered with the bank

CARD_NUMBER.title: Disputed Card Number
CARD_NUMBER.instruction: Enter the 16-digit number of the card where the incorrect transaction happened.
rejections: Card number does not match customer records

DISPUTE_REASON_SELECT.title: Dispute Reason Category
DISPUTE_REASON_SELECT.instruction: Select the option that best describes why you are disputing these charges (e.g., 'Unauthorized transaction', 'Double charge').

TRANS_COUNT.title: Number of Disputed Transactions
TRANS_COUNT.instruction: Write the total number of transactions you want to challenge.
rejections: Count does not match the number of rows filled in the table

TABLE_TRANS_DATE.title: Transaction Date (Table Column)
TABLE_TRANS_DATE.instruction: For each disputed item, enter the date the transaction took place (as shown on your statement).
rejections: Date does not match statement records

TABLE_MERCHANT_NAME.title: Merchant Name (Table Column)
TABLE_MERCHANT_NAME.instruction: Write the name of the shop, website, or service provider where the transaction happened.

TABLE_TRANS_AMOUNT.title: Original Transaction Amount (Table Column)
TABLE_TRANS_AMOUNT.instruction: Enter the full amount of the transaction in INR.

TABLE_DISPUTE_AMOUNT.title: Disputed Amount (Table Column)
TABLE_DISPUTE_AMOUNT.instruction: Enter the specific amount you are disputing. (This is usually the same as the transaction amount, unless you were overcharged only a part of the total).
rejections: Dispute amount is higher than the original transaction amount

ADDITIONAL_INFO.title: More Information
ADDITIONAL_INFO.instruction: Provide any extra details that will help the bank understand your case better (e.g., 'I still have my card with me', 'I received an OTP but did not use it').

DECLARATION_CHECK.title: Declaration Confirmation
DECLARATION_CHECK.instruction: Check this box to confirm that all the information you provided is true and accurate.
